I was not able to run this program but we are able to find the password using static analysis only. Open the executable using ghidra and locate the main function. Inside it there is a memcmp call using as arguments our given password and â€œK4F1AXxF4LZâ€. Giving the stored string as input to the program should print â€œSuccessfully logged inâ€ to the terminal.
